Package com.amazonaws.services.simpledb.util

Common utilities for working with Amazon SimpleDB, such as padding numeric datatypes so they can be compared as strings.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
SimpleDBUtils Provides collection of static functions for conversion of various values into strings that may be compared lexicographically.
 

Package com.amazonaws.services.simpledb.util Description

Common utilities for working with Amazon SimpleDB, such as padding numeric datatypes so they can be compared as strings.
